name: VR Horse Riding Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Horse Riding Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
description:
When using application remain stationary and stop using, when you experience discomfort or health reaction.
Ensure you read this document:
http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf before first use.
-------------------

Horse Riding in Virtual Reality!

Have You every wondered how it feels to ride a horse through the forest in the sunny day. Well, now You can stop wondering and just try it. xD. Virtual Reality allows you to experience things like you were actually doing them. Well, almost. You won’t experience the smell of the horse :), but that might be considered as plus :)

This is not a tour. This is real game. You can control the horse and explore all places of the map.

Features:
* Stunning environment of mountain woods
* Different modes of riding (from slow trot to very fast gallop)
* Well optimized for purpose of Virtual Reality

Play on Your favorite VR Headset.

Credits:
https://wenklystudio.com/legal/credits/VrHorse.html
